result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam Af Brown was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Adam Af Brown is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Adam Af Brown was found guilty of Operate w/o Valid License(3rd+ w/in3Yrs), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.05(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
With huber and to commence within 60 days.  Sentence may be served in another county, if it can be arranged and at no additional costs to Green Lake County.

ADDRESS INFO for Adam Af Brown
Current: 348 Pine River St, Redgranite, WI 54970 United States  (Effective: 05-11-2015)
Prior: 187 Eastridge Dr., Apt. 6, Berlin, WI 54923 United States

1:20 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by DA, an agreement has been reached.  Defendant concurs.  DA recites agreement, defendant will plea to OWI -1st offense and count 1 on 2015CM51.  Defendant concurs.

Defendant enters a plea of No Contest to OWI - 1st offense.  Corut finds the defendant guilty and impose a $200 forf + costs / DL revocation for 7 months / IID 1 year / BDF $42.50 / AODA-Waushara

Court dismisses the PAC citation.

Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.  

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty to count 1 and strikes the repeater.  Court orders count 2 be dismissed.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:  

5 days county jail, with huber - to commence within 60 days
court costs - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

Court grants the defendant may serve the sentence in another county, if it can be arranged and at no additional costs to Green Lake County.

Court adjourned at 1:29 p.m.
Status hearing at 05-11-2015 01:00 pm

1:16 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant, has contacted an attorney but has not received a call back yet.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  Court will set for status hearing on May 11, 2015 at 1:00 p.m.  Defendant to schedule an appointment with the DA's office.

Court adjourned at 1:19 p.m.
Status hearing at 04-20-2015 01:00 pm

2:34 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  DA will mail an offer.  Defendant stands mute.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond.  Court will set for Status Hearing on April 20, 2015 at 1:00 p.m.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY to the TR citations.

Court adjourned at 2:38 p.m.

Defendant called concerned about missing his court date, requested to make an appearance as soon as possible.  Court appearance was inadvertendly missed due to his father's heart complications.  Defendant was informed a warrant had been authorized.  Defendant scheduled for an initial appearance March 30, 2015 at 1:30.  Address updated and new notice mailed to Defendant.
